main.name: Haochen Gao
main.occupation: Electrical Engineering and Computer Science (EECS) Student At U.C. Berkeley
main.description: Currently, my most marketable skill is full-stack software development with the frameworks of Flask, React, and Express.
main.bio: On the technology side, besides full-stack, my interests primarily lie in machine learning, control theory, robotics, drones, and other cyber-physical systems. Away from coding, I enjoy hockey, working out, listening to EDM, and the classic Berkeley pasttimes of playing video games and drinking boba.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: I had a great time in my 1.5 years at Berkeley before COVID-19, making solar cars and drones with CalSol and UAVs@Berkeley, repspectively. Can't wait to go back. Please let me go back.

work.title: Software Development
work.description: Worked on making microservices with Flask, React, Postgres, Docker, and Heroku. Also worked on a website overhaul.

work.title: Educational Video Producer
work.description: Made educational videos on Electrical Engineering topics for K-12 audience. Also updated webpage and made minor css changes to website.

projects.title: Robot Soccer Simulator
projects.category: Path Planning and ROS for AI Soccer in a Virtual Environment
